transArray.content:
It's very good. I booked it for my elderly family members who came to Beijing for quarantine. I heard that the breakfast was very good~~
The room is overall satisfactory, the service is also very good, the location is in the middle of several communities, suitable for people from out of town.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
